Supported Runtimes

Here is a list of the runtimes and their versions that we currently support on our platform, as well as some information on previously supported runtimes that have been deprecated or migrated to newer versions:

Current Runtimes

  • Haskell 2011.4.0 / GHC 7.0.4
  • Node 0.6.9
  • PHP 5.3.10
  • PHP 5.4.0
  • Ruby 1.8.7-p352
  • Ruby 1.9.3-p125

Migrated Runtimes

  • PHP 5.3.2 migrated to PHP 5.3.10
  • Ruby 1.9.3-p0 migrated to Ruby 1.9.3-p125
